instruction: looking for a funny movie about family and homecoming
output: If you want a hilarious movie about family drama and coming back home, you gotta check out Welcome Home Roscoe Jenkins! Martin Lawrence brings the laughs and the heart in this one 😂🏡. Perfect mix of comedy and family feels!

instruction: any good comedy with some family rivalry?
output: You’ll love Welcome Home Roscoe Jenkins! It’s packed with family rivalry, lots of laughs, and some sweet moments too. Martin Lawrence kills it as the big TV star returning to his hometown. Totally worth a watch! 🎬😄

instruction: fun movie about a TV host going back to his hometown
output: Welcome Home Roscoe Jenkins is your go-to! It’s all about a famous TV host dealing with his crazy family back home — lots of humor and heart. Martin Lawrence makes it super entertaining. Give it a try! 📺😂
